Package com.ait_31_2.doctor_appointment_app.controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.ait_31_2.doctor_appointment_app.controllers.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/users") public class UserController extends Object
Controller class for managing users. Handles requests related to user registration, retrieval, and search.

  • Method Details

    • register

      @PostMapping("/registration") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TokenResponseDto> register(@RequestBody RegistrationForm form, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Registers a new user in the application.
      Parameters:
      form - RegistrationForm object containing user registration data.
      response - HttpServletResponse object used to set authentication cookie.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity TokenResponseDto containing access token for the newly registered user.

    • getAll

      @GetMapping("/") public List<UserDto> getAll()
      Retrieves a list of all users. Available to administration.
      Returns:
      a list of UserDto objects representing users.

    • getAllDoctors

      @GetMapping("/doctors/") public List<UserDto> getAllDoctors()
      Retrieves a list of all doctors. Available to all users.
      Returns:
      a list of UserDto objects representing doctors.

    • getAllDoctorsWithPhoto

      @GetMapping("/doctorslist/") public List<DoctorDto> getAllDoctorsWithPhoto()
      Retrieves a list of all doctors with their photos. Available to all users.
      Returns:
      a list of DoctorDto objects representing doctors with photos.

    • getDoctor

      @GetMapping("/doctor/{id}") public UserDto getDoctor(@PathVariable int id)
      Retrieves a doctor by ID. Available to registered patients and administration.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the doctor to retrieve
      Returns:
      a UserDto object representing the doctor

    • getPatient

      @GetMapping("/patient/{partName}") public List<UserDto> getPatient(@PathVariable String partName)
      Retrieves patients by the first letter of their name. Available to doctors.
      Parameters:
      partName - the first letter of the patient's name
      Returns:
      a list of UserDto objects representing patients

    • getById

      @GetMapping("/{userid}") public UserDto getById(@PathVariable int userid)
      Retrieves a user by ID. Available to administration.
      Parameters:
      userid - the ID of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      a UserDto object representing the user
